name: avalonbox
description: A simple lightbox solution in vanilla js.

scripts.pages:min: usemin pages/main.html --dest pages -o pages/index.html --htmlmin true --rmlr true
scripts.deploy:site: npm run pages:build && npm run pages:push
scripts.pages:build: npm run pages:build:css && npm run pages:build:js
scripts.pages:serve: npm run pages:watch:css | npm run pages:watch:js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build:js && npm run build:css

author: nafta
